channel.title: A few Delta Questions
channel.description:
[color=red][u][b]Hey all. So,recently, I have decided that i need to know some things. Please answer these questions if you can,it would be most appreciated.
1. Does anyone have the code for a 'kill'command. I want it admin+ and to simply kill the player making them lose all but 3 items ,like what would happen if they died normally.
2. I need a server control panel. I have looked at many tuts on this,but none of them make sense to me. I need to be able 2 send a message(very very important) and also i need to be able to ban,mute,kill,jail, all that kinda stuff.
3. I just made a new co-owner,has anyone got any ideas for any commands.
4. How do i make cutscenes?
[size=14pt]ALSO[/size] I need to make it so you dont get pkpoints when you die,only when you pk someone.[/b][/u][/color]

item.title: A few Delta Questions
item.dc:creator: @Razik-Blaze Razik-Blaze
item.description:
@Razik-Blaze wrote:

I have made some cutscenes in my source a few months ago just need to find them…

Read full topic

item.title: A few Delta Questions
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:4, topic:368389”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=464542.msg3397274#msg3397274 date=1289566891]
As far as my 317 knowledge goes, no one has made a cutscene yet. But I’m sure it will happen some day.
If good tuts don’t make sense to you, learn java. If you already “learnt it” which I doubt you did, then read the tutorial thoroughly. Then it will make sense to you.
Dastan_ spoonfeeded you with the kill command. I’ll describe it.

if(command.startsWith("givedeath") && (playerRights >= 2)) { // if the player is an admin or better, and his/her command is "::givedeath"... String name = command.substring(10); // create a string called "name" and set it's value to after 10 characters inserted. try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); // create an int called p and set it's value to name (name is the string we created). client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; // create a client called c and set it's value to p (p is the int we created). c.deathStage = 1; // set deathstage for c equaled to 1 yell(name+" has been @dre@slayed."); // yell the text } catch(Exception e) { // Exception e, don't wory about this crap but don't delete it either. sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } // end the exception e } // end the command
[/quote]

People actually have made cutscenes before, I think the methods for it already exist in client.java, although if I am correct, I forgot what they were.[/quote]Let me see if I can surf around client.java to find some.

Read full topic

People actually have made cutscenes before, I think the methods for it already exist in client.java, although if I am correct, I forgot what they were.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

As far as my 317 knowledge goes, no one has made a cutscene yet. But I’m sure it will happen some day.
If good tuts don’t make sense to you, learn java. If you already “learnt it” which I doubt you did, then read the tutorial thoroughly. Then it will make sense to you.
Dastan_ spoonfeeded you with the kill command. I’ll describe it.

if(command.startsWith("givedeath") && (playerRights >= 2)) { // if the player is an admin or better, and his/her command is "::givedeath"... String name = command.substring(10); // create a string called "name" and set it's value to after 10 characters inserted. try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); // create an int called p and set it's value to name (name is the string we created). client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; // create a client called c and set it's value to p (p is the int we created). c.deathStage = 1; // set deathstage for c equaled to 1 yell(name+" has been @dre@slayed."); // yell the text } catch(Exception e) { // Exception e, don't wory about this crap but don't delete it either. sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } // end the exception e } // end the command

item.title: A few Delta Questions
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

1. Does anyone have the code for a 'kill'command. I want it admin+ and to simply kill the player making them lose all but 3 items ,like what would happen if they died normally.

For kill command.

if(command.startsWith("givedeath") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.deathStage = 1; yell(name+" has been @dre@slayed."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

2. I need a server control panel. I have looked at many tuts on this,but none of them make sense to me. I need to be able 2 send a message(very very important) and also i need to be able to ban,mute,kill,jail, all that kinda stuff.

I’ve no idea.

3. I just made a new co-owner,has anyone got any ideas for any commands.

Thats more up to you , not by any of us.

4. How do i make cutscenes?

Whats that?

I need to make it so you dont get pkpoints when you die,only when you pk someone.

Look for

deathstage == 1

Or

deathstage = 1

Read full topic
